comments.author: holydarkness
comments.body: Hi, will there be any community manager from their platform coming here to address questions? I found several things that made me quite uneasy and it'll be very nice if Aeddon team could appoint someone to answer with the capacity of their officials.If I may start from probably the easiest, is the site build by a website builder, on a free trial version? I saw this watermark on the bottom of each page, and if I may use wix as reference, it's basically there to persuade the user of the web-builder platform, on this case, Smilodo, to purchase paid membership and remove the mark.

comments.author: McStone
comments.body: Hi Holydarkness, I'm a team member of Aeddon, so let me shed some light into your your first question:The smilodo.com link is there if you pay or not (not like on wix).But we don't need to pay anyway, because Aeddon owns smilodo.com.Let me explain this a bit: Our company's journey started with smilodo.com, and then went over eCommerce in the Metaverse to the full Open World Metaverse that we envision today.Please feel free to ask more stuff that makes you uneasy, either with a private message, or right here in the thread.We have nothing to hide...Thanks!

But it's not my character boasting around stuff here before the deals are closed.Cheers PS: still "uneasy" ??
